definition: to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Some problems concerned with the mast cells in the cardiac wall were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中對心壁內這種細胞的有關問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: I don't think we're talking about quantum mechanics here.
sentences.chinese: 我不認爲我們這裏是在討論量子力學的問題。

sentences.english: The shortest Confidence interval of unimodal distribution is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了單峯分佈的最短置信區間的問題。

sentences.english: Speaking: discuss the following questions about smoking in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 就下列關於在工作場所吸菸的問題進行討論。

sentences.english: In this paper , the structure of macromaterialogy is discussed and the branching of technological sciences is considered.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論宏觀材料學的結構，並思考技術科學的分支。

sentences.english: The block decoupling problem for linear time-invariant systems is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論線性時不變系統的塊解耦問題。

sentences.english: So on Friday, we'll start with talking about the wave functions for the multi-electron atoms.
sentences.chinese: 在週五，我們要開始討論，多電子原子的波函數。

sentences.english: Finally the researches on the MHD dynamo and other kinds of dynamos are briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了MHD發電機和其它類型發電機的研究概況。

sentences.english: In addition to governance concerns, this part discusses staffing and portal operations.
sentences.chinese: 除管理問題外，本部分還討論員工管理和門戶操作。

sentences.english: "We were discussing the history of Volantis, " Haldon said to him.
sentences.chinese: “我們正在討論瓦蘭提斯的歷史，”哈爾頓告訴他。

sentences.english: Based on randomizing techniques, this paper discussed how the sketch-based approach estimates approximate answers to aggregate queries.
sentences.chinese: 討論了基於草圖的複雜聚集查詢的近似處理算法。

sentences.english: This is the topic we're going to do it after spring break.
sentences.chinese: 是我們春假之後會討論的問題。

sentences.english: The new progress of investigation of the organogermanium compounds is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了有機鍺化合物研究在國內的新進展。

sentences.english: The isosteric heats of adsorption were determined from the isotherms and the factors that influence their variations were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 從等溫線確定了等量吸附熱並討論了其影響因素。

sentences.english: I will talking with my manager about the bank transfer by Western tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 明日我將會和我們經理討論通過西聯收款的問題。

sentences.english: The paper deals with the convegence of Riesz operators for Jacobi expansions.
sentences.chinese: 討論了雅可比展開的黎斯算子的若干逼近性質。

definition: to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
